author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_15_0_X`:
  * This is the PR for the `CMSSW_15_0_X` branch, this is the release cycle used for 2025 HLT-menu development.
  * These updates correspond to further changes accumulated after the "V1.3" (last) GRun menu was delivered. 
 
This update includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets:
- [CMSHLT-3687](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3687): Request to freeze a LowPU 2025 menu

In addition this PR introduces the following commits:
* 5f1ee0da9af894280738b4aa351634facb8375da : Migration of all table to `CMSSW_15_0_15_patch1` template
* 31c50d56437fbbbaf4ea87d336fd556deda93475 : Update release template of 2025 V1.3 frozen menu, and include  [CMSHLT-3687](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3687)

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests.

This branch passes:
- `addOnTests.py`
- `runTheMatrix.py -l 16834.0`
- `scram b runtests`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

**Important disclaimer**: this PR is **NOT** a backport and it won't be forward-ported. This is a standalone request from the HIN PAG to include paths used in the 2025 low-PU run in the 2025 MC production.
title: HLT menu development for `15_0_X` (12/N)
